itunes:title: 3 tips for a successful summer
title: 3 tips for a successful summer
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
This Summer is all about living in the moment on the F&G podcast, and this week Britt is back to share 3 tips for your healthiest & happiest summer yet! Tune in to chat about changing routines & missing workouts, getting outside, sunscreen & water, day trips & time away, living life & being grateful for the phase of life we are in right now!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

1:57 LA Gymshark recap

2:40 time flies

6:00 quality connection

8:50 gym time

10:10 girls night

12:00 Britt’s YouTube video

14:01 ROUTINE CHAT

14:55 TIP 1 - Live in the moment

16:50 TIP 2 - Don’t “wait until…”

23:20 Britt’s Healthy Girl Summer TIPS

33:15 TIP 3 - Make a bucket list

38:10 review of the week
